imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Wide hospital reception/modern facility banner illustration/photo style (facility-banner.dim_1600x600.png)
- Medical team/doctor consultation hero-style image (doctors-hero.dim_1600x700.png)
- Abstract medical pattern/texture background suitable for subtle section backdrops (medical-pattern.dim_1800x1200.png)

existing_features.title: Improve overall UI quality across all public pages (Home, About, Services, Emergency, Contact, Appointments, and 404) by applying consistent spacing, typography scale, section layout, and component styling (cards, buttons, icons) to achieve a polished, modern hospital website look and feel, without changing the meaning of existing content.

Perform a responsive design pass to ensure the site looks high-quality on mobile, tablet, and desktop (including navigation/header, hero sections, multi-column grids, and forms), preventing overflow, cramped layouts, and inconsistent section padding.

Improve accessibility and perceived quality by ensuring interactive elements have visible focus styles, sufficient contrast, and appropriate semantic structure (headings hierarchy, labels, button/anchor usage) across the site.

Add high-quality, consistent medical-themed imagery as static assets and integrate them into the existing layout where appropriate (without adding new product features), ensuring images are optimized and look sharp on high-DPI displays.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a high-quality hospital website (design and overall polish).

projectName: Improve hospital website quality and visual polish
